channel.title: Templates on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Templates on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Functional and behaviors specs
item.description: Functional and behaviors specs template v1.0December 19 Disclaimer:This document is a template which purpose is to present the structure and tone of voice/semantic specifications should follow. The information detailed in this file are not relevant, and the different parts are not related to each other. It is made from different specs stitched together. Do not attempt to build what is written below StructureThis template presents how to write a page Intro, and features’s Context, functional specs and behaviors for features.

item.title: Technical characteristics specs
item.description: Technical characteristics specs template v1.0December 19 Disclaimer:This document is a template which purpose is to present the structure and tone of voice/semantic specifications should follow. The information detailed in this file are not relevant, and the different parts are not related to each other. It is made from different specs stitched together. Do not attempt to build what is written below StructureThis template presents how to write technical characteristics specs.
